meanings.definition: Things that cannot be defined or described.
meanings.sent1: The mysteries of the universe are full of indefinables.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to understand the indefinables of abstract art.
meanings.sent3: Trying to catch a cloud is as tricky as grasping onto indefinables.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were a whirlwind of indefinables, swirling beyond comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel is one of the most intriguing indefinables in science fiction.

meanings.definition: Qualities or characteristics that are impossible to explain or pinpoint.
meanings.sent1: The charm of the old house was one of those indefinables that drew people in.
meanings.sent2: There was a certain magic in her smile, an indefinable quality that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent3: His cooking had an indefinable taste that left everyone guessing the secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends was an indefinable thread connecting their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The painting had an indefinable beauty that left viewers in awe of its uniqueness.
